long_description: This mod introduces screen doors to Advtrains - previously, newcomers may walk on tracks and be smashed by a running train wagon. To set up a screen door, step on the track (make sure it is inactive!) and place the screen door (closed or fixed) onto the platform block.
name: advtrains_doors
title: Advtrains Screen Doors
